Author: cherriedbaby
Text: i hate this! my ‘friends’ (friends of friends i have classes with) constantly talk about fat people and say mean things? and i don’t know if they think i’m skinny enough to joke in front of, or if they think i’m fat

Author: tinglybanana
Text: This is such a problem with me. My bf makes jokes about fat people all the time or points them out and I'm like "wtf she's just like me, is that what he thinks of me?" It really bothers me.
